poem:
**Unremembered**

In the stillness of my room,  
flowers wither unseen,  
love buried twice.  
The calendar slips,  
empty hands  
reach for forgotten grief—  
years like pale petals  
falling in silence.  
Absent hearts  
mark time  
indifferently,  
while mine  
beats loud  
for both.
